title: Australian PM’s Special Rep meets President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana) Mr. John McCarthy, Special Representative for Kevin Rudd, Prime Minister of Australia paid a courtesy call on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on 24th February. Mr McCarthy was accompanied with Ms.Kathy Kay Klugman, High Commissioner of Australia in Sri Lanka at the occasion….
